short_description: ambassador vietnam is a signs & commercial screens supplier based in hồ chí minh city, vietnam.
long_description: for more than 30 years the name "ambassador signage & lighting" has meant more than just signs, lighting. we are an industry leader in high end architectural signage, led & decorative/ambient lighting, solar lighting, led display screen with proven skills and expertise to design and build projects from the ground up, beginning to end. we push the envelope in both design and fabrication to create pleasing, performing and visually effective architectural signage, from single location to global, guaranteeing the best quality. achieving customer satisfaction by exceeding client expectations is perpetuated by our passion for a corporate culture that embraces a never-ending commitment to excellence and uncompromised value. we are blessed and proud to have our team of managers, designers, fabricators and installers each have decades of experience in producing and rolling out any size signage & led lighting program. because of this, some of the world's largest corporations and institutional property owners rely exclusively on us to implement new signage programs, and service tens of millions of square feet of their properties.

generated_description: ambassador signage & lighting is a company that specializes in high-end architectural signage, led & decorative/ambient lighting, solar lighting, and led display screens. they have a team of experienced managers, designers, fabricators, and installers who are capable of producing and rolling out signage and led lighting programs of any size. they offer turnkey solutions for all lighting needs, from design to installation, ensuring quality craftsmanship, on-time delivery, and competitive pricing. their mission is to provide creative, attractive, and high-quality signage and lighting solutions that enhance corporate image, business, or property, resulting in increased revenue, asset appreciation, and immediate roi.
